event.title: Turn Key
event.description:
‘TURN KEY’ is a special event held to hand over our new finished construction project to our awesome customers. This function includes key hand over, house warming and more.

ABOUT OUR SELF.

We are the leading construction service provider in ernakulam offering all the construction related services at affordable cost through our certified professionals.
Top services we offering are;
civil work in ernakulam
electrical work in ernakulam
plumbing work in ernakulam
roofing work in ernakulam

interior designing in ernakulam
repair and maintenance work in ernakulam

All are welcome !
